summary.span: 提供从托管代码到 Active Directory 域服务的轻松访问权限。

span.span: Provides easy access to Active Directory Domain Services from managed code.

summary.span: 该命名空间包含两个组件类，即 和 ，它们使用 Active Directory 服务接口 (ADSI) 技术。

span.span: The namespace contains two component classes, and , which use the Active Directory Services Interfaces (ADSI) technology.

summary.span: ADSI 是 Microsoft 提供的一组接口，作为使用各种网络提供程序的灵活的工具。

span.span: ADSI is the set of interfaces that Microsoft provides as a flexible tool for working with a variety of network providers.

summary.span: 无论网络有多大，ADSI 都可以使管理员能够相对容易地定位和管理网络上的资源。

span.span: ADSI gives the administrator the ability to locate and manage resources on a network with relative ease, regardless of the size of the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的类可与任何 Active Directory 域服务服务提供程序一起使用。The classes in this namespace can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers. 当前提供程序为： Internet Information Services (IIS) 、轻型目录访问协议 (LDAP) 、Novell NetWare 目录服务 (NDS) 和 WinNT。The current providers are: Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT. ADSI 是 Microsoft Active Directory 域服务的编程接口，它使应用程序能够使用单个界面与网络上的不同目录交互。ADSI is a programmatic interface for Microsoft Active Directory Domain Services that enables your applications to interact with diverse directories on a network using a single interface. 使用 ADSI，可以创建执行常见任务（如备份数据库、访问打印机和管理用户帐户）的应用程序。Using ADSI, you can create applications that perform common tasks, such as backing up databases, accessing printers, and administering user accounts. 假设您在使用这些类之前，您大致了解 Active Directory 域服务。It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using these classes. 有关 Active Directory 域服务的详细信息，请参阅主题 [Active Directory 对象](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121193&clcid=0x409) 和 [Active Directory 技术 Backgrounder](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121194&clcid=0x409)简介，以及以下主题：For more information on Active Directory Domain Services, see the topics [Introduction to Active Directory Objects](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121193&clcid=0x409) and [Active Directory Technology Backgrounder](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121194&clcid=0x409), as well as the following topics: - [使用 Active Directory 域服务Using Active Directory Domain Services](/windows/desktop/AD/using-active-directory-domain-services) - [Active Directory 服务界面Active Directory Service Interfaces](/windows/desktop/ADSI/active-directory-service-interfaces-adsi) - [轻型目录访问协议Lightweight Directory Access Protocol](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/ldap/lightweight-directory-access-protocol-ldap-api) - [实现 Active Directory 服务接口提供程序Implementing Active Directory Service Interfaces Providers](/windows/desktop/ADSI/implementing-adsi-providers) - [绑定到 ADSI 对象Binding to an ADSI Object](/windows/desktop/ADSI/binding-to-an-adsi-object) - [IADsOpenDSObject::OpenDSObjectIADsOpenDSObject::OpenDSObject](/windows/win32/api/iads/nf-iads-iadsopendsobject-opendsobject) Active Directory 域服务使用树结构。Active Directory Domain Services use a tree structure. 树中的每个节点都包含一组属性。Each node in the tree contains a set of properties. 使用此命名空间遍历、搜索和修改树，并读取和写入节点的属性。Use this namespace to traverse, search, and modify the tree, and read and write to the properties of a node. 类可封装 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中的节点或对象。The class encapsulates a node or object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 此类用于绑定到对象、读取属性和更新属性。Use this class for binding to objects, reading properties, and updating attributes. 与 helper 类结合使用， 可提供对生命周期管理和导航方法的支持，包括创建、删除、重命名、移动子节点和枚举子级。Together with helper classes, provides support for life-cycle management and navigation methods, including creating, deleting, renaming, moving a child node, and enumerating children. 使用 类对 Active Directory 域服务层次结构执行查询。Use the class to perform queries against the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. LDAP 是支持搜索 (ADSI) 提供程序的唯一系统提供的 Active Directory 服务接口。LDAP is the only system-supplied Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) provider that supports searching. 通过 返回的实例 （包含在类的实例中）搜索 Active Directory 域服务层次结构 。A search of the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy through returns instances of , which are contained in an instance of the class. 注意：命名空间中的许多类、方法和属性都 使用 代码访问安全性选项。Note: Many of the classes, methods, and properties in the namespace use the code access security option. 这意味着，代码访问安全性要求仅在实时编译期间发生，并且仅在调用程序集上执行，而不是在整个调用堆栈上执行。This means that the code access security demand only occurs during just-in-time compilation and that the demand is performed only on the calling assembly and not up the entire call stack. 因此，调用方不应将在运行时从此命名空间创建的对象传递给不受信任的代码。Because of this, callers should not pass objects that are created from this namespace at runtime to code that is not trusted.
